radius-client_schema.description: RADIUS client configuration. It will be replaced by the huawei-radius module defined in unified datacom YANG model.

dead-count.description: To configure the dead count for all RADIUS servers.

dead-interval.description: To configure the dead interval for all the RADIUS servers.

dead-time.description: To configure the dead time for all the RADIUS servers.

fail-rate.description: Configure the fail rate for all the RADIUS servers.

recovery-enable.description: Enable/disable configure server recovery on response for all the RADIUS servers.

name.description: RADIUS server group's name. Range supported [a-z][0-9] and [.,_,-].

retrans-count.description: Number of times packet retransmission will happen if server is not responding.

auth-retrans-count.description: Number of retransmission times of RADIUS authentication request packets if the server is not responding.

auth-retrans-interval.description: Authentication response timeout interval of the RADIUS server.

acct-retrans-count.description: Number of retransmission times of RADIUS accounting request packets if the server is not responding.

acct-retrans-interval.description: Accounting response timeout interval of the RADIUS server.

shared-key.description: To configure shared key value for a particular group, which is a string ranging from 1 to 128 characters for a unencrypted key and 24 characters or 32 to 268 characters for a encrypted key.

group-mode.description: To configure mode (primary secondary and load balance) for a particular group.

source-interface-name.description: To configure source interface name at group level.

domain-mode.description: To configure domain Mode. It can not be set to no when admin-level node in aaa module is configured.

ipv4-servers.description: List of servers in a group.

ipv4-server.description: Configure RADIUS IPv4 server for a particular group.

server-type.description: Type of RADIUS server (authentication or accounting, or both).

port.description: Configured server port for a particular server.

server-mode.description: To configure primary or secondary server.

shared-key.description: To configure shared key value for a particular server, which is a string ranging from 1 to 128 characters for a unencrypted key and 24 characters or 32 to 268 characters for a encrypted key.

ipv6-servers.description: List of servers in a group.

ipv6-server.description: Configure RADIUS IPv6 Server for a particular group.

server-type.description: Type of RADIUS server (authentication or accounting, or both).

port.description: Configured server port for a particular server.

server-mode.description: To configure primary or secondary server.

shared-key.description: To configure shared key value for a particular server, which is a string ranging from 1 to 128 characters for a unencrypted key and 24 characters or 32 to 268 characters for a encrypted key.

dead-interval.description: To configure the dead interval for all the RADIUS servers.

dead-time.description: To configure the dead time for all the RADIUS servers.
